Wind
In southwest, southeasterly 7 to severe gale 9. In northeast, southeasterly 4 to 6.
Sea state
In southwest, very rough or high. in northeast, moderate or rough becoming rough or very rough.

In southwest, occasional rain. In northeast, mainly fair.
Visibility
In southwest, moderate or poor. In northeast, good.
